missionProperties.missionInfo:
{-} The door is locked.
{-} The Rebel mission token represents a comlink. Jyn can interact with the comlink to call out Szark.
{-} The mission will progress when Jyn calls out Szark.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

globalEvents.name: Open Crate 1
globalEvents.eventText:
You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

globalEvents.name: Mission Briefing
globalEvents.eventText:
Hiding in cover, you wait for Szark to show himself. "It's apparently his moon. He's bound to come eventually." Jyn swears, scowling. Your wait is quite long.

"There he is," Jyn says, pointing. Down the street, Szark walks out of the cantina, over to the small group of Imperial troops. "Working another deal, huh? What, one moon wasn't enough?"

Before you can stop her, Jyn leaps out of cover and sprints forward, firing her blaster. Szark's eyes go wide, and he scrambles away. He ducks into his personal cantina, slamming the door shut as blaster bolts sizzle past his head.

You're a few steps behind Jyn as Szark's mercenary and Imperial allies draw their weapons.

{-} Deploy the heroes to the blue highlighted space.
{-} Jyn Odan does not deploy with the heroes and instead is placed in the red highlighted space.
{-} The door is locked.
{-} The Rebel mission token represents a comlink. Jyn can interact with the comlink to call out Szark.
{-} The mission will progress when Jyn calls out Szark.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

globalEvents.name: End of Mission - Rebels win
globalEvents.eventText:
Wounded, Szark scrambles around the corner. Jyn follows, and you hear an exchange of blaster fire, then silence.

Not long after, she reemerges, holstering her weapon. "Let's go," she says, not looking back.

{-} The Rebels win the mission!
{-} Jyn receives the "Peacemaker" Reward card.
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.

globalEvents.name: End of Mission - Rebels lose
globalEvents.eventText:
Shouting, Jyn jumps out of cover, trying to squeeze off a few more shots. Three blaster bolts catch her in the chest, and she falls. In a fighting retreat, you drag her barely alive body back to the ship.
"Until next time, Jyn ... " A transmission comes in. "You'll have to visit again soon!" Szark gives a long, mocking laugh, making you glad that she's unconscious.

{-} The Rebels lose the mission.
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.

globalEvents.name: Gunfight
globalEvents.eventText:
The door to the cantina slowly opens and a thin Trandoshan saunters out.

''My, my," he growls, smiling. ''Jyn Odan. Never thought I'd see the day." His hand slides down toward his holstered blaster.

entityProperties.name: Comlink
entityProperties.theText: An old, stationary comlink is connected to the cantina's communication systems.

eventActions.theText: {-} Deploy one regular Trandoshan Hunter figure. This is Szark.

{-} Szark gains additional Health equal to twice the threat level.
{-} Szark gains +1 {G}.
{-} Szark applies + 2 Accuracy to his attack results and gains {B}: + 2 {H} (top of the surge priority list).
{-} The Rebels win when Szark is defeated.

{-} Szark gains additional Health equal to twice the threat level.

{-} Szark applies + 2 Accuracy to his attack results and gains {B}: + 2 {H} (top of the surge priority list).
{-} The Rebels win when Szark is defeated.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

entityProperties.name: Cantina Door
entityProperties.theText: The door into Szark's cantina is locked tight.

entityProperties.name: Comlink

An old, stationary comlink is connected to the cantina's communication systems.

Jyn Odan can interact with the comlink to call out Szark.
